casebody.data:
THE NC STATE BAR
v.
SCOTT. No. 250P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Robert L. Scott, Greensboro, for Scott, Robert L. David R. Johnson, Deputy Counsel, for The NC State Bar. Katherine Jean, Raleigh, for The NC State Bar.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of July 2015 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
